newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Rugby Union - Scotland odds-on to beat Ireland.
newsitem.headline: Rugby Union - Scotland odds-on to beat Ireland.

text.p: Ireland's Paddy Power bookmaker firm on Friday installed Scotland as 2-1 favourites to beat Ireland in Saturday's Five Nations championship game at Murrayfield.
Power quoted 7-4 against an Irish win and 16-1 against the game ending in a draw.
Odds of 150-1 are offered against punters nominating the exact final score in the match.
Power quoted 20-1 against no tries being scored.

It quoted 13-2 against exactly one try, 3-1 against exactly two tries, 5-2 against exactly three tries, 7-2 exactly four tries, 6-1 exactly five tries, 12-1 exactly six tries and 28-1 exactly seven tries.
Penalty tries do count, Power said.
